custom-sql.sql: SELECT AA.boardSeq, AA.title, AA.content, AA.writerId, AA.writerDate, AA.readCnt, AA.groupBoardSeq, AA.replyCount, AA.groupId FROM ( SELECT B.boardSeq, B.title, B.content, B.writerId, B.writerDate, B.readCnt, B.groupBoardSeq, B.groupId, (select COUNT(*) from EDCON_Board C where C.groupBoardSeq = B.boardSeq) AS replyCount, (select COUNT(*) from EDCON_Board C where C.groupBoardSeq = B.boardSeq AND C.writerId = #userId#) AS answerCount FROM EDCON_Board B WHERE B.customId = 'solver_@@solverId@@' AND B.groupBoardSeq = 0 ) AS AA WHERE AA.answerCount = 0

<isNotEmpty property="parentCategoryId"> SELECT E.* FROM ( </isNotEmpty> SELECT A.*, if(C.boardSeq IS NULL,0,SUM((SELECT if(COUNT(*)>0,0,1) FROM EDCON_Board D WHERE D.groupBoardSeq = C.boardSeq AND D.groupId = C.groupId)))AS answerCount FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A LEFT OUTER JOIN EDCON_Board C ON C.groupBoardSeq = 0 AND C.groupId = A.groupId AND C.customId = CONCAT('solver_',A.scienceAppId) LEFT OUTER JOIN EDAPP_ScienceAppManager B ON A.scienceAppId = B.scienceAppId WHERE A.status = 1901004 AND ( A.authorId = #userId# OR B.managerId = #userId# ) AND A.appType = 'Solver' GROUP BY A.scienceAppId <isNotEmpty property="parentCategoryId"> )E INNER JOIN EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink D ON E.scienceAppId = D.scienceAppId WHERE D.parentCategoryId IN (#parentCategoryId#) GROUP BY E.scienceAppId </isNotEmpty>

SELECT APP.* FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp APP LEFT OUTER JOIN EDAPP_ScienceAppManager MANAGER ON APP.scienceAppId = MANAGER.scienceAppId INNER JOIN User_ USERS on APP.authorId = USERS.userId WHERE <isNotEmpty property="appStatus"> APP.status = #appStatus# AND </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="userId"> ( APP.authorId = #userId# OR MANAGER.managerId = #userId# ) AND </isNotEmpty> APP.appType = 'Solver' <isNotEmpty property="searchText"> AND (ExtractValue(APP.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchText@@%' OR USERS.firstName LIKE '%@@searchText@@%') </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="projectCategoryId"> AND APP.projectCategoryId = #projectCategoryId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="begin"> Limit #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp APP LEFT OUTER JOIN EDAPP_ScienceAppManager MANAGER ON APP.scienceAppId = MANAGER.scienceAppId INNER JOIN User_ USERS on APP.authorId = USERS.userId WHERE <isNotEmpty property="appStatus"> APP.status = #appStatus# AND </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="userId"> ( APP.authorId = #userId# OR MANAGER.managerId = #userId# ) AND </isNotEmpty> APP.appType = 'Solver'
<isNotEmpty property="searchText"> AND (ExtractValue(APP.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchText@@%' OR USERS.firstName LIKE '%@@searchText@@%') </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="projectCategoryId"> AND APP.projectCategoryId = #projectCategoryId# </isNotEmpty>
